main.name: Marvel Sompotan
main.description: I am a student and I use react to develop pages.
main.bio: Hi my name is Marvel Matthew Sompotan, I am 18 years old, I am from North Sulawesi in Indonesia, My hobby is playing Volleyball, Billiard, and listen to music. I am the only child of myfamily.
main.contactmessage: You can contact me anytime by adding your message down here!
